resources.string: Let\'s customize everything to our likings.
Iconify supports all Pixel and AOSP based ROMs.
It is time for iconify to do some internal work.
Storage permission is required to build the necessary files.
Use Magisk to root your device!
Looks like your device is not rooted!
Reboot your device to put all files in place.
Logs have been saved in documents folder.
Reboot your phone to use the latest added features and options.
Unleash Your Imagination, Make It Yours
Change Qs tile rows and columns
Change height of QS panel tile
Check for new versions in background.
Check for updates over wifi only.
Show warning on how to re-optimize module in Xposed Menu.
Some options like blur intensity doesn\'t take effect until systemui is restarted
Show a beautiful card on the home page.
Clear caches generated due to the usage of custom fonts, images, or gifs.
Disable all Iconify overlays, colors, and miscellaneous changes.
Thanking those who made this possible.
Use custom color for battery icon
For roms with black QS panel
Notification Preview.\nClick to apply this style.
Remove top shade of QS panel
Helps to retain custom colors\nSystemUI restart required
Disable this to get exact chosen colors
Certain combinations may not be compatible with certain ROMs. In such instances, simply experiment with alternative combinations until you find the one that best suits your needs.
Use if above ones did not work
Disable back gesture of left side
Disable back gesture of right side
Make track of volume slider thin
Make track of volume slider thick
Creates a magisk flashable module for this style

This option will create a magisk module inside Download folder in your Internal Storage. Flash the module named IconifyCompanion.zip in Magisk. Always uninstall previous Iconify Companion module (if installed) and reboot before flashing new one.

Note:
• Uninstall the module before updating rom.
• Recreate the module if you change or update rom.
• Do not flash a module which wasn't created based on your rom.
Also known as Better QS\nMust use Notch Bar Killer
Kill empty space of notch bar
Before enabling Iconify from LSPosed modules, long press on Iconify and click on Re-optimize. After that enable Iconify and restart your SystemUI. This is necessary for a smoother experience.

You are currently in Xposed Only mode. This requires iconify to be enabled in LSPosed app. Also make sure that Iconify module is shown in Magisk manager. To get access to all features, simply re-open the app and go through the installation process!

Force all colors to be white
Show iOS like depth wallpaper\nMust use custom lockscreen clock

This feature is currently in beta stage. So bugs are expected.

Known Bugs:
• Always on Display is broken. Disable AOD to avoid display issues.
• Tapping on lockscreen makes the wallpaper jump.
Set color of statubsar clock text
